links: Alois P. Heinz, Table of n, a(n) for n = 0..160
maple: logtr:= proc(p) local b; b:= proc(n) option remember; if n=0 then 1 else p(n)- add(k *binomial(n,k) *p(n-k) *b(k), k=1..n-1)/n fi end; n->b(n+1) end: a:= logtr(n-> n^2): seq(a(n), n=0..25); # _Alois P. Heinz_, Sep 14 2008
author: _N. J. A. Sloane_.
